This module implements moving results.

Imports

cell, fieldtype, notice, rule, ../private/misc

Types

MoveResult = object
  chainCount*: Natural
  disappearCounts*: array[Puyo, int]
  detailDisappearCounts*: Option[seq[array[Puyo, int]]]
  fullDisappearCounts*: Option[seq[array[ColorPuyo, seq[int]]]]
Moving result.

Procs

func colorConnects(self: MoveResult): seq[int] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the number of connections of color puyos that disappeared. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported. 
func colorConnects(self: MoveResult; color: ColorPuyo): seq[int] {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the number of connections of color that disappeared. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported. 
func colorCount(self: MoveResult): int {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the number of color puyos that disappeared. 
func colorCounts(self: MoveResult): seq[int] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the number of color puyos that disappeared in each chain. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported. 
func colorPlaces(self: MoveResult): seq[int] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the number of places where color puyos disappeared in each chain. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported. 
func colorPlaces(self: MoveResult; color: ColorPuyo): seq[int] {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the number of places where color disappeared in each chain. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported. 
func colors(self: MoveResult): set[ColorPuyo] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the set of color puyos that disappeared. 
func colorsSeq(self: MoveResult): seq[set[ColorPuyo]] {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the sequence of the set of color puyos that disappeared. UnpackDefect is raised if not supported.

    forbids: [].}
Returns the number of garbage puyos that disappeared. 
func garbageCounts(self: MoveResult): seq[int] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
